changeSet.author: hong.hu (generated)
changeSet.createView: SELECT sp.Vendor_key, Retailer_key, Store_key, sp.Item_key, sp.LastOrderKey, sp.LastReceiptKey, LastOrderQty, LastReceiptQty, sp.SecondLastOrderKey, sp.SecondLastReceiptKey, SecondLastOrderQty, SecondLastReceiptQty, im1.MAJOR_CATEGORY as Department FROM $(schema).FACT_OSM_STOREPRODUCT sp INNER JOIN ( SELECT b.vendor_key, b.ITEM_GROUP, b.MAJOR_CATEGORY FROM ( SELECT vendor_key,ITEM_GROUP, MAJOR_CATEGORY , ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY ITEM_GROUP ORDER BY "DeptsCount" DESC) AS "rank" FROM ( SELECT ITEM_GROUP, vendor_key, OSM_MAJOR_CATEGORY AS MAJOR_CATEGORY , COUNT (DISTINCT ITEM_KEY) "DeptsCount" FROM $(common).DIM_PRODUCT WHERE OSM_MAJOR_CATEGORY IS NOT NULL GROUP BY vendor_key, ITEM_GROUP, OSM_MAJOR_CATEGORY ) a ) b WHERE b."rank" = 1 ) im1 ON sp.vendor_key = im1.vendor_key AND sp.ItemNumber = im1.ITEM_GROUP;

append.value: ORDER BY Vendor_key, Retailer_Key, Item_Key,DC_Key, Period_Key SEGMENTED BY MODULARHASH(Item_Key, DC_Key) ALL NODES PARTITION BY Vendor_Key;
